Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ummm- Not there, Yakky-tan. That's my butt, not my tail.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: ...Ooooh, oooooh. You're doing it on purpose.
Yoshino-chan, Yoshino-chan.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Sei sei sei. Please wait, Vivienne. Grabbing Yoshino there is pointless too. It's better to do that kind of thing to Shashou.
Gee, Yoshino-chan, how long are you going to sleep talk?
Wake up. Hurry up, or your food will get cold.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooh, this smells so good. This is the smell of home-cooking from Nishiki...

Name: Nana
Phrase: Hmmhmm, good morning.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Please give Yoshino some time to think. Just a few seconds.

Name: Nana
Phrase: Eh? What's wrong?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: ...Think finished. It's okay now. Took a long time to understand the situation. Thank you very much for the warm meal.

Name: Nana
Phrase: You're welcome. It's been a long time since you've been in Nishiki. I thought to make you plenty of home-cooked food in Nishiki.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yes, it's been a long time since Yoshino's been in Nishiki.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's also been a long time since Yoshino saw Nana's face.

Name: Nana
Phrase: What are you talking about, Yoshino-chan? You just saw my face last night too.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: No, never saw you. The last time Yoshino saw Nana's face was in dreams. Sometimes dreams about Nana.

Name: Nana
Phrase: I'm not talking about dreams, this is reality. Last night we talked under the futon together.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: No, you didn't. Yoshino and Nana didn't sleep together.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yoshino is at work with all the members of the SSS. Haven't been back to Nishiki for a while.

Name: Nana
Phrase: Are you alright? What's wrong with Yoshino-chan today? You have been here for three days now.

Name: Nana
Phrase: Yoshino-chan said father and mother might be coming back, so you said we should wait together. I thought you were going to introduce me to them as your friend.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yoshino's oka-san and otou-san are coming back?

Name: Nana
Phrase: Yes, they are. Thanks to you and your friends, the Mist has lifted and the people who have disappeared are coming home.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Oooh, alright. If that's the case, Yoshino might be able to meet otou-san and oka-san--

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: ...If only that were true.

Name: Nana
Phrase: Don't worry. The cherry blossoms are blooming outside. I'm sure they are there waiting for Yoshino.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That's not true, Nana.

Name: Nana
Phrase: No? Did I say something wrong?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Otou-san and oka-san left Yoshino at the factory in the mountains. If they were to return, they would have come to the factory in the mountains.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: But the factory is gone. They were angry with us for making so many bad things, so they had to close it down. So, if Yoshino wants to wait for oka-san and otou-san to come back, will have wait for them at the big shidare-zakura in the village.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That sakura tree is where Yoshino was forced to wake up...

Name: Nana
Phrase: You don't believe me, do you?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yoshino believes in Nana.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: But Nana is no longer in this world. She is probably living happily with her mother and sister somewhere else. If this is where Nana is, she would not be alone.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: You are not Nana, are you? You have the same face as Nana, but you are not Nana. This inn is not a real inn either.

Name: Nana
Phrase: You say that this world is a fake? My body, my voice, everything is fake?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Your body and voice are fake, but it's a bit different from real fakes. What Yoshino sees is just an illusion.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yoshino will now break this illusion. Watch carefully. If Yoshino claps with hands, the illusion will be broken.

Name: Nana?
Phrase: You are an interesting person after all. You are even trying to cast further illusions on me.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Oooh-- you knew. Yoshino was going to show you a nice view, but...

Name: Nana?
Phrase: Show me your power. Can you break my illusion and change this view?

Name: Nana?
Phrase: What is the landscape you wanted to show me?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Like this, for example.

Name: Nana?
Phrase: Splendid sorcery. Beyond the realm of illusionism, it slightly alters the space I have created...

Name: Samantha
Phrase: You are loved by the Beast God of Nishiki. The only thing that keeps your hands clean when you touch the accursed steel machinery is that you are a superior sorceress.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: A good sorcerer must be of pure and sturdy heart. That is the condition of one who is powerful enough to work miracles and move people's hearts.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: You are welcomed into the station of Beast God and Sorcery.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: The words are too complicated, Yoshino doesn't really understand,

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: But thankfully that Samantha is not Nana. Nana wouldn't be able to accept this landscape that's avoided from showing, would she?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Don't worry. Yoshino is not lonely. Nana can talk together again in the dream world.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yoshino is very happy to hear Nana's voice, for the first time in a long time.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooh-?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Yoshino!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Thank goodness! Yoshino's back too!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooh, all of you are here.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: 'Yoshino's back too'... meaning everyone else come back from their stations, too?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Yes. Vivienne and Yakutsk also returned at about the same time.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: We were worried because Yoshino was a little late. Yakutsk and I didn't stay there for too long, so we were really worried...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Well, this means Yoshino was in a lot of trouble.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Trouble? Aren't they all just illusions?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: A Yoshino who just woke up would've figured out it's all an illusion in three seconds.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: That's what I'd expect from Yoshino.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It kind of frustrates me, but, well, Yoshino is a sorceress after all.

Name: Putra
Phrase: If you saw through the illusion so quickly, then why was it so hard?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Yeah. What kind of trial did you have to go through?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ummm... it's very difficult to describe in a few words...'

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Had an intense sorcery battle with the Samantha.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: What!? A battle of sorcery? What do you mean!?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: As it says on the tin. Yoshino canceled Samantha's sorcery, and then used sorcery to make booms.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Are you a superhuman...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: So? Of course you won, didn't you?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Probably. Because otherwise Yoshino wouldn't be here.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Now we should be able to enter the Giant Tree. Once we pass through this gate, we will finally meet Ricardo.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Um, I haven't been through the trials like you girls...

Name: Mary
Phrase: There are four stations shown on the route map, and the number of trials Samantha mentioned is also four. In order to connect the railway lines in St. Iris, it could maybe mean people other than St. Iris are the keys to connecting the railways in St. Iris.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I hope that's what you mean...

Name: Mary
Phrase: Don't worry. You've been chosen by the Giant Tree. If the Giant Tree or Ricardo had refused you, they would have done so by now.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Mary...

Name: Mary
Phrase: Get it off your chest. You are here for a good reason. Just as it is no mere coincidence that you and I have met.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Yes, I do. I believe in myself. And also Sir Conductor and everyone of the SSS.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: And of course, I believe you.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa... the time has finally come.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: The Giant Tree of St. Iris. It's visible to the naked eye from the Sea of Fog, but nobody has ever been able to get close enough to it.\nThe St. Iris Giant Tree is visible to the naked eye from the Sea of Fog, but unapproachable. I never thought I'd see the day when I could enter such a place on a Mist Train...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Conductor, I'm a bit scared.
I think everyone here is. No one is not scared.\nEven Mary's expressions are completely different.\nThe pressure of not being allowed to fail has amplified everyone's fears.

The first Divine Child to reach the Giant Tree was my mother, Ricardo Trevithick.\nEven though it was not made public, it is a historic achievement.\nPerhaps there are other Divine Children besides Ricardo who have also reached the Giant Tree without being known to the public.
However, as the very first Divine Child who has reached the Giant Tree on this Mist Train that she designed... That's you, Paddington.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Well, if you put it that way, Conductor was the first. I just followed behind Conductor...
Don't say that. There are so many scenarios that we wouldn't be able to break through without you, Paddington, there are also many people that you have helped too.

You have contributed so much to the Special Steel Squad's cause as our second-in-command. I'd like to thank you again, Paddington Elrond. You are the Divine Child, the pride of St. Iris, and the first Divine Child to conquer the Steel Railway of the Giant Tree.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: C-Conductor...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa, no I can't accept this! That's the sort of thing you should say only after when you're alone with me in a world where everything is resolved and we're at peace, with a nice warm cup of tea, huddled together, talking about the future...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa!? What kind of a lousy speech is this! I was just about to put up my courage and ask Conductor to give me an Iron Injection too...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: However! Today I am a very different Paddington! I will not be intimidated by whatever appears from the Giant Tree! I'm going to give whatever it is a good beating!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooh- very tough Paddington.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Alright then, I suppose we'll have to let her deal the first blow then.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: HAWAAAAA--! I'm going to face thiiiiiis!?

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Mary, I'll entrust the honour to you!

Name: Mary
Phrase: Why is there a Steel Seeker here? There's no signs of Ricardo at all...
Just when we've alighted the stations shown on the route map of the Giant Tree Railroad to the Giant Tree, we are they are confronted by an unexpectedly powerful enemy just before the Gate entrance.
The Steel Seekers, who had tormented the SSS so many times before, stood in front of us...
